metadata.synopsis: One-liner for Blushing Memraid patron. He is a grumpy, angry, sweary half-orc who isn't happy with the city.

0.speaker: Slog
0.text: 'Duke' Gortash - bloody hells. Like that slimy prick gives a rat's arse about us.
0.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

1.speaker: Slog
1.text: You're not one of 'em goody-do-wells, are you? Urgh, read about it in Baldur's Mouth. Can't stand a lickarse.
1.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

2.speaker: Slog
2.text: If you're some big fan of 'Duke' Gortash, turn your arse around and walk - preferably straight into the harbour waters.
2.context: InternalNodeContext: Coronation of Gortash as lord of Baldur's Gate.

3.speaker: Slog
3.text: You picked the best spot in the city for a pint - blows the prissy 'Elfsong' out of the water, I can tell you that.
3.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the AbsoluteNodeContext: proud

4.speaker: Slog
4.text: Read about a bunch of pissants - and you fit the bill. All I can say is this - well bloody done. City is a shithole - cause as much trouble as you can, eh?
4.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation drop because an article at Baldur's Mouth

5.speaker: Slog
5.text: Did you hear that scum-sucker Gortash bit the big one? Good, says I. Prick was too oily by half.

6.speaker: Slog
6.text: Folks be going on about the 'good of the city', blah, blah. Fuck that, I say. It's everyone for themselves - so take it all, mate.
6.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation drop because an article at Baldur's Mouth

7.speaker: Slog
7.text: Yes, yes, butter wouldn't melt in your arsehole - so says the papers. I. Don't. Care.
7.context: InternalNodeContext: Reputation booster because an article at Baldur's Mouth

8.speaker: Slog
8.text: The hells is the Captain? Why didn't she stop them freaks?
8.context: NodeContext: panicked after a red cap attack, looking around

9.speaker: Slog
9.text: Bet all the lords and ladies of Baldur's Gate are in a tizzy with their poster boy dead. Hope someone shits in their soup - hah.

10.speaker: Slog
10.text: Steel Watchers are dropping in the streets like flies! Bet the Flaming Fist are pissing themselves without their precious murder machines.

11.speaker: Slog
11.text: Maybe I'll rob the head of a broken Watcher - would make a nice trophy for my wall, don't you think?

12.speaker: Slog
12.text: You should see this place when the Captain's old crewmates pull up - it's a damn bloodbath. I love it.
12.context: InternalNodeContext: The base topic of this character. You can choose between: Murders at temple, Steel Watch, Brain-Quakes, Impending coronation of Gortash, Gang war: Guild vs. Stone Men, Approaching Army of the AbsoluteNodeContext: fierce grin
